title: Alexis Tsipras
summary: Alexis Tsipras (Greek: Αλέξης Τσίπρας, pronounced [aˈleksis ˈt͡sipras]; born 28 July 1974) is a Greek politician serving as Leader of the Official Opposition since 2019. A member of Syriza, a party over which he has presided since 2009, he served as Prime Minister of Greece from 2015 to 2019.[1]
